edu.snu.onyx.runtime.executor.data.block

Class NonSerializedMemoryBlock<K extends Serializable>

  • java.lang.Object
    • edu.snu.onyx.runtime.executor.data.block.NonSerializedMemoryBlock<K>
  • Type Parameters:
    K - the key type of its partitions.
    All Implemented Interfaces:
    Block<K>

    @ThreadSafe
public final class NonSerializedMemoryBlock<K extends Serializable>
extends Object
implements Block<K>
    This class represents a block which is stored in local memory and not serialized.

    • Method Detail

      • putPartitions

        public Optional<List<Long>> putPartitions(Iterable<NonSerializedPartition<K>> partitions)
                                   throws IOException
        Stores NonSerializedPartitions to this block. Invariant: This should not be invoked after this block is committed.
        Specified by:
        putPartitions in interface Block<K extends Serializable>
        Parameters:
        partitions - the NonSerializedPartitions to store.
        Returns:
        the size of the data per partition (only when the data is serialized in this method).
        Throws:
        IOException - if fail to store.

      • putSerializedPartitions

        public List<Long> putSerializedPartitions(Iterable<SerializedPartition<K>> partitions)
                                   throws IOException
        Stores SerializedPartitions to this block. Because all data in this block is stored in a non-serialized form, the data in these partitions have to be deserialized. Invariant: This should not be invoked after this block is committed.
        Specified by:
        putSerializedPartitions in interface Block<K extends Serializable>
        Parameters:
        partitions - the SerializedPartitions to store.
        Returns:
        the size of the data per partition.
        Throws:
        IOException - if fail to store.

      • getPartitions

        public Iterable<NonSerializedPartition<K>> getPartitions(KeyRange keyRange)
                                                  throws IOException
        Retrieves the NonSerializedPartitions in a specific hash range from this block. Invariant: This should not be invoked before this block is committed.
        Specified by:
        getPartitions in interface Block<K extends Serializable>
        Parameters:
        keyRange - the hash range to retrieve.
        Returns:
        an iterable of NonSerializedPartitions.
        Throws:
        IOException - if failed to retrieve.

      • getSerializedPartitions

        public Iterable<SerializedPartition<K>> getSerializedPartitions(KeyRange keyRange)
                                                         throws IOException
        Retrieves the SerializedPartitions in a specific hash range. Because the data is stored in a non-serialized form, it have to be serialized. Invariant: This should not be invoked before this block is committed.
        Specified by:
        getSerializedPartitions in interface Block<K extends Serializable>
        Parameters:
        keyRange - the key range to retrieve.
        Returns:
        an iterable of SerializedPartitions.
        Throws:
        IOException - if failed to retrieve.

      • commit

        public void commit()
        Commits this block to prevent further write.
        Specified by:
        commit in interface Block<K extends Serializable>
